section-header.title: Indigenous Land Management Costs
section-header.description: The Indigenous Land Management Cost Calculator is an online tool developed to help Indigenous organizations in the Xingu basin plan their budgets and raise funds for the implementation of their PGTAs.

item-1.title: Planning
item-1.description: Assisting Indigenous organizations, partners and supporters in financial planning, from assessing funding gaps to estimating budgets for each managementactivity .

item-2.title: Evaluation
item-2.description: Support decision-making by local organizations through information related to activity costs.

item-3.title: Prioritization
item-3.description: Demonstrate the financial investment necessary for the most effective implementation of public activities and policies.

section-thematic-axes.title: Thematic axes
section-thematic-axes.description: The costs of each managementactivity were categorized into thematic axes, according to the main themes of the PGTAs. The thematic axes are:

section-methodology.title: Methodology
section-methodology.description: To calculate the costs of Indigenous Land Management Plans (PGTAs), the calculator uses statistical relationships between various characteristics of each Indigenous Land.. The tool then estimates the costs of implementing the management plan. Find out more about the characteristics of Indigenous Lands that the model took

item-1.title: Size of the land
item-1.description: Extent of the Indigenous Land, in hectares.

item-2.title: Number of villages
item-2.description: Number of villages within the Indigenous Land.

item-3.title: Population
item-3.description: Number of people living within the Indigenous Land.

item-4.title: Number of Indigenous peoples
item-4.description: Number of peoples living in the Indigenous Land.

item-5.title: Degree of threat
item-5.description: Classification based on the type and intensity of threats to the Indigenous Land.

item-6.title: Complexity of access
item-6.description: Classification of the difficulty of access for most of the villages in the Indigenous Territory.

item-7.title: Location of headquarters
item-7.description: whether in a town or village.
